amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funding to be used in contravention of the applicable provisions of the Buy American Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert Buy American provisions into the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayes amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Hayes.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hayes amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
